item.title: Fox News Politics Newsletter: Trump to award Charlie Kirk highest civilian honor
item.description: Welcome to the Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump administration, Capitol Hill and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: Charlie Kirk posthumously awarded Medal of Freedom on what would have been his 32nd birthday

item.title: LISTEN: Man leaves disturbing voicemail for ICE agents: ‘Hope they’re doxxed’
item.description: An anti-ICE caller left a disturbing voicemail taunting ICE agents, saying he hopes “every one of those lawless c----" gets “doxxed one by one."
